data.title: Virtual Boston ARTCC
data.meta_description: This website is for VATSIM's Virtual Boston ARTCC
data.text:
The Boston Virtual ARTCC website has been transitioned to https://www.bvartcc.com This site is no longer maintained and is slated for permanent retirement. Please visit the new site. Information on this site, including any of its subpages, should be considered outdated and unreliable.

Looking to keep in touch with the latest news, events, and updates from the Virtual Boston ARTCC? Be sure to follow us on Twitter (@vzbwartcc) and "Like" us on Facebook (Facebook.com/vbostonartcc).

Interested in controlling for one of the most well-respected and professional Air Route Traffic Control Center's on the VATSIM Network? Watch this video and get a sense of what it's like!
